mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (name, description, price, stock, thumbnail_url) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{thumbnailUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, thumbnail_url = #{thumbnailUrl}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
